definition: easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

pinyin: Shang4 hai3 Zheng4 quan4 Jiao1 yi4 suo3

definition: Yi Jianlian (1987-), Chinese basketball player for the New Jersey Nets (NBA)
Shenzhen Stock Exchange, abbr. to 深交所[Shen1 Jiao1 suo3]
pinyin: Shen1 zhen4 Zheng4 quan4 Jiao1 yi4 suo3

sentences.english: The nature of the stimulus may predispose some children to attention problems.
sentences.chinese: 刺激本身很可能使一些孩子易產生注意力問題。

sentences.english: We will take good care and properly protect the patients vulnerable.
sentences.chinese: 並且對於易受傷害患者予以優先照顧和妥善保護。

sentences.english: Cracks are easily occurred during constructthereinforced concrete box culvert.
sentences.chinese: 鋼筋混凝土箱涵在施工過程中，易產生裂縫。

sentences.english: Lotus Supercenter has been widely recognized by Shanghai people.
sentences.chinese: 易初蓮花購物中心已經被上海人普遍認可。

sentences.english: The colors arent fast, so be careful when you wash this shirt.
sentences.chinese: 這些顏色易褪色，所以洗襯衫時要小心。

sentences.english: However, their cutters can be twice as expensive as the Easy Cutter.
sentences.chinese: 然而，它們的切割器的價格是“易剪”的兩倍。

sentences.english: A secure, memorable password is easy for you to remember, and hard for others to guess.
sentences.chinese: 安全可靠又難以遺忘的密碼應該是易記且難猜的。

sentences.english: Typical goods moved are high demand, high value, perishable .
sentences.chinese: 典型的貨物搬到高要求，高價值，易腐爛變質。

sentences.english: Contain long-lasting formula, which is wild and easy to apply color.
sentences.chinese: 蘊含持久配方，質地溫和易上色。

sentences.english: Glass containers are non-permeable, but they are breakable and heavy.
sentences.chinese: 金屬容器易腐蝕，且讓儲存在裏面的水變得很難喝。

sentences.english: And we're a delicate species, with a long list of wants.
sentences.chinese: 我們是一種易受傷害的種類，有着一系列的需求。

sentences.english: Smile. The best thing always happen when you are not expected.
sentences.chinese: 微笑吧，最好的事總是發生在最不經易的時候。

sentences.english: Yi Yi surprised to learn the truth and exasperated, accusing children s four seasons in calculating.
sentences.chinese: 易奕獲知真相驚怒交加，指責童四季攻於心計。

sentences.english: The disease is not rare in clinic, but it is often misdiagnosed and patients have to be reoperated on.
sentences.chinese: 該病臨牀並非少見，但既往易被誤診而遭再次手術。

sentences.english: Branches may be made straight, but not an old tree.
sentences.chinese: 嫩枝易矯直，老樹難彎曲。

sentences.english: Your Sim will cheer for and be exited about doing the basic things in life. Yay! Wooo!
sentences.chinese: 易興奮的市民就算只是做生活中普通瑣事也會興奮。

definition: to be jealous of/fear/dread/scruple/to avoid or abstain from/to quit/to give up sth
to fit/suitable/proper/just (now)/comfortable/well/to go/to follow or pursue
to make heavier/to emphasize/(of an illness etc) to become more serious/to aggravate (a bad situation)/to increase (a burden, punishment etc)
in order to avoid/so as not to
to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
to avert/to prevent/to avoid/to refrain from
